FILE ?yourbinfilenamehere.bin? BINARY
TRACK 01 MODE1/2352
INDEX 01 00:00:00

Step-by-step:

Here we have the rld-nu2a.bin file

1. Right click on a blank space in the same folder than your bin file
2. Select new text document
3. Double click to open your New Text Document.txt
4. Paste this into the file:

FILE "rld-nu2a.bin" BINARY
TRACK 01 MODE1/2352
INDEX 01 00:00:00

Make sure you put the .bin to the exact name of your bin file.

5. Click File menu
6. Click Save as
7. Save the file as the exact name of your bin file except with a cue extension: 
"rld-nu2a.cue" 

8. Now any program that can read CD-rom ISOs (nero, alcohol, etc) should be ready to read the file.
